item.title: A biotech stock for investors scared to invest in the risky industry
item.description: Citi sees shares of Ligand Pharmaceuticals soaring another 46% on top of an already impressive year-to-date rally.

item.title: The five biggest stock moves Todd Gordon has made to prepare his portfolio for 2026
item.description: Todd reviews how he is managing his portfolio for the new year.

item.title: Walmart's move to Nasdaq is part of a wider plan to build an AI and e-commerce powerhouse, investors say
item.description: One potential reason for Walmart's move to the tech-heavy Nasdaq is to justify a higher valuation, investor Kevin Simpson told CNBC.

item.title: This cruise stock is outperforming. Goldman Sachs expects momentum to carry into 2026
item.description: The bank upgraded the cruise stock to buy from neutral.

item.title: There's no Dow or S&P 500 for cryptocurrencies yet. Bitwise is getting a step closer with new ETF
item.description: The move comes despite a series of recent pullbacks in the crypto market that saw bitcoin trade at around $85,000 earlier this month.
